results.description: Leeds United sign France Under-20 goalkeeper Illan Meslier on a season-long loan from Lorient.
results.shortTitle: Leeds sign goalkeeper Meslier on loan from Lorient
results.title: Illan Meslier: Leeds United sign Lorient goalkeeper on loan

thumbnail.altText: Illan Meslier in action for France Under-20s

results.description: Arsenal sign France Under-20 international midfielder Matteo Guendouzi from Lorient for an undisclosed fee.
results.title: Matteo Guendouzi: Arsenal sign France Under-20 international midfielder

results.description: Real Madrid and Barcelona battle for the title on the final day of La Liga on Sunday, while Juventus can be crowned champions of Italy.
results.shortTitle: Five-year wait over for Real Madrid?
results.title: Real Madrid on brink of La Liga title while Juventus can clinch Serie A

thumbnail.altText: Real Madrid boss Zinedine Zidane (left) and Barcelona boss Luis Enrique

results.description: Ghana striker Abdul Majeed Waris puts French club Lorient's Ligue 1 survival above personal glory after his ninth goal of the season helped the club claim a 5-1 win over Metz.
results.shortTitle: Ghana's Waris targets survival with Lorient
results.title: Ghana's Majeed Waris targets French Ligue 1 survival with Lorient

thumbnail.altText: Lorient's Ghanaian forward Abdul Majeed Waris
Lorient's Ghanaian forward Abdul Majeed Waris
Lorient's Ghanaian forward Abdul Majeed Waris
Lorient's Ghanaian forward Abdul Majeed Waris

results.description: Paris St-Germain respond to the agony of their Champions League exit at Barcelona by beating Lorient to go second in Ligue 1.
results.title: Lorient 1-2 Paris St-Germain

results.description: Nice go top of Ligue 1 after drawing with struggling Bastia, who finish with 10 men.
results.title: Bastia 1-1 Nice

results.description: Mario Balotelli scores a late winner before being sent off as Nice beat Lorient to return to the top of Ligue 1.
results.title: Nice 2-1 Lorient
